newsitem.title: USA: SITEL plan to acquire Mitre wins approval.
newsitem.headline: SITEL plan to acquire Mitre wins approval.

text.p: SITEL Corp said Wednesday that stockholders in a special meeting have approved the company's plan to acquire Mitre PLC, a European telemarketing company.

The transaction, expected to be completed next week, provides for the exchange of 9,170,553 newly issued SITEL common shares for all of Mitre's shares, which are privately held by members of Mitre's management.
